thread.title: Heidi Klum Forgot Her Pants at 2017 Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Heidi Klum Forgot Her Pants at 2017 Grammy Awards

title: Heidi Klum Forgot Her Pants at 2017 Grammy Awards
text: Heidi Klum wore a silver chain-mail dress to the 2017 Grammy Awards.   Heidi Klum looked every inch a supermodel at the 59th Annual Grammy Awards in a silver Philipp Plein chain-mail minidress. The extremely short, see-through dress — that displayed her undergarments and showed off her long legs — matched her metallic silver pumps. She accessorized with Lorraine Schwartz jewels, styling her hair in a middle part with loose waves. Heidi Klum wore a silver minidress to the 2017 Grammy Awards.   Celebrity hairstylist, Wendy Iles, posted a video of the model off to the event. Chain-mail has been a popular trend with models and actresses within the Hollywood set as of late. Model Kendall Jenner picked a dazzling minidress for her 21st birthday. Another top model, Bella Hadid , wore a chain-mail two-piece ensemble on her 20th birthday. With Klum’s Grammy Awards look, it doesn’t seem like this trend is going anywhere any time soon! Read More:
